user.title: Nanoleaf Lines Setup
user.description: Enter the IP address of your Nanoleaf controller and choose the setup method.

data_description.host: The IP address of your Nanoleaf controller on the local network
data_description.name: Name for the device (used in entity IDs)
data_description.pairing_mode: Enable this option to automatically pair a new device. Disable if you already have a token.
data_description.create_groups: Creates groups of segments for faster updates (recommended for Ambilight/Screen Mirroring)

pair.title: Pair Nanoleaf Device
pair.description: Now hold the power button on your Nanoleaf controller for 5-7 seconds until the LED starts blinking. Then click 'Submit'.

data_description.token: The authentication token for API access

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Nanoleaf device. Please check the IP address and ensure the device is reachable on the network.
error.invalid_auth: The provided token is invalid. Please create a new token or use the pairing option.
error.pairing_timeout: Pairing timeout. Please make sure you pressed the power button on the Nanoleaf controller and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs.

abort.already_configured: This Nanoleaf device is already configured in Home Assistant.

groups.title: Configure Manual Groups
groups.description:
{num_segments} segments available.

Format: Groups separated by semicolon, segment indices within a group separated by comma (0-based, first segment = 0).

Example for 3 groups with 3 segments each:
{example}

Leave empty for automatic grouping.

error.invalid_group_config: Invalid group configuration. Please check the format (e.g. '0,1,2; 3,4,5').
